name: Object Segmentation
description: Partition an image into distinct segments, isolating objects from the background for detailed analysis.
usecase: Used in medical image analysis, autonomous navigation, and image editing applications.
challenges: Challenges include accurate boundary delineation, handling complex backgrounds, and scalability to large images.
popular_methods: Common methods include semantic segmentation (e.g., U-Net), instance segmentation (e.g., Mask R-CNN), and graph-based approaches.
